text: Marita del Carmen Camacho Quirós (born 10 March 1911) is the former First Lady of Costa Rica when her husband Francisco Orlich Bolmarcich was president from 1962 to 1966. She is the first person who was a First Lady to become a supercentenarian. Camacho Quirós is the oldest living person in Costa Rica and the oldest former First Lady in the world. ==References== Category:1911 births Category:Living people Category:Supercentenarians Category:First Ladies and Gentlemen of Costa Rica
title: Marita Camacho Quirós
